# wantsExtendedDynamicRangeContent

**Instance Property**

Tells whether or not the layer supports content with extended dynamic range.

## Declaration

```swift
var wantsExtendedDynamicRangeContent: Bool { get set }
```

## Determining Layer Properties

- **colorspace**: The layer’s colorspace in Core Graphics.

items.description: The layer’s colorspace in Core Graphics.
